description: A proper wizard is always prepared, crystallize your mana for the future!
The darkness holds no secrets for the arcane.  Adjust your sight to see in perfect darkness!
Behind the cool name hides a common joke spell to spook your friends and restrain dogs.  It can be useful in some special cases.
The light can not interact with you unless you want it to.  Become invisible!
A magical aura distorts light around your body, making it easier to dodge enemy attacks.
Harried by evil spirits or creatures from beyond?  This spell will keep your mind safe!
Allows you to swap places with a previously existing holographic image of yourself.  If the universe itself can't tell you apart, who could?
Evil has become pervasive throughout the world.  Let your power be the light that shines in the darkness!
You channel your life force itself into your spiritual energy.  You spend hp to regain mana.
With an intense ritual that resembles crossfit, you manage to put some of your pain at bay.
Transform your enemies into frogs.
An ethereal-looking zombie rises from the depths of the earth to fight for you.  You may be able to summon more with a higher level in this spell.

You pour mana into an unwilling and unprepared vessel, causing cellular break-down, internal hemorrhaging, leylines to become muddled, and electronics to overcharge.  Immensely gruesome, crude, and was once illegal world-wide, not that it matters now.
Kill a summoned creature, consuming its life energy to regain some health.
Summons a floating disk that is sworn to carry your burdens.
A few decrepit looking animals rises from the depths of the earth to fight for you.  You may be able to summon better with a higher level in this spell.
Kill an ally creature, converting its life energy into compact rune, that you can use afterwards.
Force the undead creature you pick to obey your command, making it an ally for a short time.
Explode a living energy inside your undead, to release a tremendous force around.
Heals a little bit of damage on the target.
Evens out damage among your limbs.
This spell extrudes a long nasty whiplike tentacle of sharp bones and oozing acid from your body, it has a long reach attack and vicious damage.
A spell that warps your body in alien ways to increase your physical abilities and strength.
When cast, the mage opens his mouth and sprays acid in a wide cone to dissolve his foes into goo.  Just imagine what he'll do with the goo.
This spell grows a large pouch out of your skin on your back, allowing you to store your gear in it.
This spell creates a long shaft of bone with a wicked point and blades along its length.
You always wanted to fire energy beams like in the animes you watched as a kid.  Now you can!
Creates a magical light.
Blind enemies for a short time with a sudden, dazzling light.  Higher levels deal slightly higher damage.
A mass of spectral hands emerge from the ground, slowing everything in range.  Higher levels allow a bigger AoE, and longer effect.
Encases your whole body in a magical aura that protects you from the environment.
This spell causes roots and vines to burst forth from the ground and grab your foes, slowing them and doing a small amount of damage as they dig in.
This spell causes roots to spear out the ground and stab into your foes in an arc, impaling them.
This spell creates a projectile of hardwood that shoots forth from the caster's hand at high speed to stab into an enemy.
This spell conjures a magical wooden recurve bow that fires endless arrows for as long as it lasts.
Your connection to living things allows you to go into a magical trance.  This allows you to recover fatigue quickly in exchange for mana.
Are you the crazy cat lady?
Call to the wild for aid from some wolves.

A spell from a darker sect of druidry, created to forcibly begin the circle of life anew.  For without rot, you cannot have growth.  Affects a huge area, but is indiscriminate and slow both in casting and effect.  Once lost entirely to the passage of time, this spell was thought to be no more than a myth, the stuff of fairy tales, albeit grim ones.
Directed magical energy that slowly heals your body from wounds.
Using magic energy from herbs to allows you to heal yourself.
Turn a bunch of leaves and bark into an effective bandage.
Encases your arms and hands in a sheath of magical stone, you can punch and defend yourself with it in melee combat.
Focusing mana into your leg, you stomp your foot and send out a shockwave, knocking enemies around you onto the ground.
You focus on the stones beneath you and draw from their agelessness.  Your mana is converted to stamina.
This spell projects a wide spray of sharp metal shards, cutting into your foes and friends alike.
This spell projects a piercing rod of conjured iron at those that dare oppose you.
Creates an omnidirectional spray of razor sharp metal shards all around you.
Fires a conjured stone projectile at high velocity.
You close your eyes and the earth surrenders its secrets to you.
Envelops your entire body in armor formed from living rock, encumbering yet protective.
Drawing upon the surrounding earth, you form a pillar of solid rock.  Experience will make the task easier, and less disruptive to the surrounding area.
Your hands tries to transform the body of your enemy into a pure stone.  The effect is temporary, but it can deal significant damage.
Explode your stone skin, to deal massive damage to all enemies around.
Summon a stone spikes underground, that penetrate your enemies, and nail them for a while.
Shape the basic working tools, using your own magic abilities and earth nearby.  Activate to change the shape of a tool.
Fill yourself with the power of Earth, and make each your attacks as devastating as an earthquake.
You cover your body with a layer of razor sharp crystals.  Monster that attack you will take some damage in return, and gives you some additional cut damage in melee.
Hide yourself between the sand gust.  It's harder to hit you, and monster's can't spot you.
Shape a strong golem out of the stone.  It may help for a lot, but you have not enough energy to support it forever.
Pull the smooth rock underground, using your forces of earth shaping.  You can use it as a table, or as a primitive anvil.
Use magic to reveal nearby terrain.
Causes an intense heat at the location, damaging the target.

Summons a small flame that does not burn you, but you can use it to light things on fire.  It seems to need you to have some intent to light things on fire, because you are able to put it in your pocket with no issue.
Causes jagged icicles to form in the air above the target, falling and damaging it.
You hurl a pea-sized glowing orb that when reaches its target or an obstacle produces a pressure-less blast of searing heat.
You blast a cone of frigid air toward the target.
You're pretty sure you saw this in a game somewhere.  You fire a short-range cone of fire.
You're pretty sure you saw this in a game somewhere.  You fire a short-range cone of ice and cold.
Freezes the touched target with intense cold.
Encases your feet in a magical coating of ice, allowing you to glide along smooth surfaces faster.
You project a glowing white crystal of ice and it explodes on impact into a blossom of shattering cold.
Creates a magical shield of ice on your arm, you can defend yourself with it in melee combat and use it to bash.
Covers you in a thin layer of magical ice to protect you from harm.
Cast a field of shadows.
I cast Magic Missile at the darkness!
Teleports you in a random direction a short distance.
Summons a well of gravity with the epicenter at the location.  Deals bashing damage to all creatures in the affected area.
A blast of concentrated magical power that obliterates a large area.
A bolt of magical power that only damages your foes.
This spell gives you an enormous boost of speed lasting a short period of time.
A beam of focused magical power that damages any foes in its path.
Teleports you in a random direction a medium distance, to help escape your foes in dangerous situations.
You become more graceful, agile, and coordinated.
You gain the perception of an eagle.
You gain the strength of an ogre.
You become wily like a fox.

You focus your mana into a microscopically thin pulsed beam of pure energy, capable of extreme range and precision; as well as unparalleled penetration, provided proper skill.  Once the invention of a notorious assassin, this spell has slayed many a king and noble.  Passed on only through direct descendants over the ages, though occasionally shared by them to others.
A quick burst of electricity strikes a target and possibly one other nearby.
A short-ranged fan of electricity shoots from your fingers.

The go-to spell for many Stormshapers, this iconic spell does just what you expect: you shoot lightning from your fingertips.  However, this lightning is more directed than most lightning, and travels in a line through most non-solid targets.
A powerful blast of wind slams into anything in front of your outstretched hand.
The spell moves out of your mouth, creating a giant shockwave that shatters everything in its path.
Create a high-pressure zone originating from the selected point.  Shortly after, a massive pressure wave will crush everything inside, inflicting barotrarumatic injuries on everyone affected.

Create a high-pressure zone originating from the selected point.  Shortly after, a massive pressure wave will crush everything inside, inflicting barotrarumatic injuries on everyone affected.  The pressure differential will also pull unprepared creatures inside the zone before collapsing.
Cover your head with an air bubble, allowing you to breathe underwater or prevent breathing of toxic gases.
Create arcs of devastating electric charge in an area around you, roasting everything within.
Fill your legs with energy and quickly dash to a target destination.
Inject a corrosive electric energy into targets within the affected area, weakening them and dealing huge damage over time.
Enhance your sight with your powers.  It allows you to see creatures of the same energy around you, and block or dodge an additional attack your enhanced perception speed could anticipate.
Your hands start to emit a huge amount of energy, that you release with each attack.
Insulate the skin against electrical damage.  Particularly useful for the apprentice Stormshaper, whose magical control is weak and whose efforts could easily end in self-electrocution.
Summon a Teravolt, a small, semi-intelligent spirit that homes onto hostile creatures and explodes into a huge spark cloud.
A magical wind pushes you forward as you move, easing your movements and increasing speed.
Creates a crackling magical warhammer full of lightning to smite your foes with, and of course, smash things to bits!
Encases your arm and hand in a sheath of crackling magical lightning, you can punch and defend yourself with it in melee combat.
A spell of blessing that gives you energy and boosts your abilities.
This blade of light will cut through any evil it makes contact with!
Evil will not make it through your defenses if your faith is strong enough!
Creates a magical lamp.
You have found a way to convert your spiritual energy into power you can use for your bionics.
This spell creates a very short range bolt of electricity to shock your foes.

This spell manipulates some quantum something or other to tunnel you through a short distance of space, and even matter, unfortunately there's that whole uncertainty thing as to where you come out.  It leaves you a little dazed on the other side as you reorient yourself.

This spell stimulates the synapses in your brain beyond normal processing speeds, giving you a large boost in mental processing capability, including enhancing your reflexes, speed, and raw intellectual power.  Use responsibly!
You concentrate and release a focused beam of photons at a target, also known as a laser.
This spell conjures flying animated blades that will cut your enemies down to size.  Into small pieces that is.
This spell manipulates light into barely tangible duplicates of a living being, a magical hologram in short.
You fire a small concentrated ball of lightning at the target.  The electricity diffuses quickly, so it doesn't do much damage, but you're able to fire off several quick ones in a row.
You use the power of your own blood to imbue necrotic energy into your gaze, damaging the target you look at.
You summon a gift of the earth which will purify water.  Greater levels yield greater numbers of seeds.
You fire a cone of X-rays that magically allow you to see that area for a short time.
You overcharge your internal batteries to send a semi-directed beam from your face.
With a shout and a gesture, the target starts bleeding from old wounds.
Banish a monster to the lesser-known nether dimension.  If a monster is more powerful than you can handle, the spell drains your life force to make up the difference.
This spell creates an invisible aura to protect you from acid.
This scroll details how a spell called 'Lightning Blast' which is commonly used among Stormshapers can be altered to become much more powerful, at a much higher mana cost.
Through giving of one's own life force, you restore withered and barren plant life nearby.  What remains will need time to regrow its full strength.
Channels some of the user's own life force into healing energy, for the sake of one's allies.
Make the terrain answer to your call.
Spits a warped needle of sinew and bone, carrying with it a sting that slows your victim.
Projects a spray of acrid blood and gore all around you, growing to ensnare your prey in a field of twitching poisonous tendrils.

Turns your biological mastery inwards, medically enhancing your flesh.  Rather than strength of healing, it staves off blood loss and purges wounds before they can turn septic, at the cost of increased hunger and thirst.

By manipulating the charge in the air, you can conjure a sharp snap of lightning over a wide area.  While its destructive potential is a far cry from natural lightning, the light and thunderclap produced will leave your foes reeling.
Summons ghostly foxfire worked from living marsh vapor, to lead your enemies astray.  With more experience, this spell can conjure multiple ghost lights.
Draws forth a broad wall of thick fog.  While the sudden force of air pressure will floor any enemies caught in it, the conjuration is otherwise harmless.
You can channel magical energy to open locked wooden doors from a short range away.
You can channel magical energy to open any locked door from a short range away.
Summons a small electric spark, that do not harm anything.  You can use it to ignite something flammable.
You manifest an aura of crackling electricity around you to strike attackers with baleful lightning.
This scroll is covered in sap and rose thorns.  You can still make out some of the writings, but it probably won't work the same.
Unleash your inner beast by snapping a fur-covered bone, becoming beastly.
Ignite a wooden sword to create a flaming saber.
A pocketful of combustible powder is ignited, creating a cone of flame with ashes that stick to those in its path.
Animate a layer of acid around you, burning attackers and increasing your melee damage.
Link your live blood to dead blood and bones, creating a club eager to harvest the living.
Release a resonant bolt of spiritual energy at a nearby target.  It will disrupt the natural link between matter and animus, causing heavy but never lethal damage.
Infuse a sling with excess energy, delivering devastating throws before it tears itself apart.
Emulate a railgun, launching a knife at high speed.

Manafied Infernal Combustion Engine (Rideable)
Detailed schematics for a motorcycle, that are somehow simultaneously obviously impossible and yet intriguingly intuitive.
In one margin, the word 'Mojocycle' has been scrawled in a flowing hand.
Causes an intense heat at the location, greatly damaging the target.
Summon a jar of force you can use to store liquids in.
Your hands freeze anything they touch at temperatures so cold it slows down your foes.
Your connection with nature allows you to become one with it; you revitalize your body while in communion with the flora and fauna around you.
Offer some of your life in a ritual to get tokens of growth in return.

name.str: Scroll of Whisper of the Leaves
name.str_pl: Scrolls of Whisper of the Leaves

description: Deepen your bond with the forest and understand the whispers of the trees.
Sink your senses into the earth and learn of the approach of anything walking upon it.
Like the unyielding stone, lessen your need for food or water.

name.str: Scroll of the Turning of the Earth
name.str_pl: Scrolls of the Turning of the Earth

description: Ask the earth spirits to prepare the earth for planting and sowing.

name.str: Scroll of Harvest of the Hunter
name.str_pl: Scrolls of Harvest of the Hunter

description: Create usable arrows out of forest detritus.
Open your mystic senses and locate the things that should not be.
Winter-be-gone through the power of of modern magic.
Summer-be-gone through the power of of modern magic.
Who's afraid of heights?  Not you, after you learn this spell.
Free climb better than the best.

name.str: Scroll of Limbs of the Frog
name.str_pl: Scrolls of Limbs of the Frog

description: Swim with the fishes, with your froggy hands and legs.
Grow to enormous size and crush your enemies.
This research paper has an extremely complicated series of formulae with various genetic interspersed.  It claims that the spell will cure the aftereffects of XE037 overexposure.
Eat rotten food with no ill effects.  It doesn't make it taste any better, though.

name.str: Scroll of Knowing the Day and the Hour
name.str_pl: Scrolls of Knowing the Day and the Hour

description: Cast this spell to know exactly what time it is.  You're amazed anyone is still making these scrolls; this spell might as well be a museum piece.
Mark an area to be aetherically resonant so that you can easily find it later; for example, by using the Word of Recall spell.
The counterpart to Magus's Mark, reciting this simple spell will instantly return you to wherever it was that you cast that spell.

Summon a spirit through whose eyes you can see.  This spell was frowned upon pre-Cataclysm due to the potential for misuse, but its many legitimate uses kept it on the curriculum at major universities' thaumaturgical studies departments.

name.str: Scroll of Beguiling the Savage Beast
name.str_pl: Scrolls of Beguiling the Savage Beast

description: Charm an animal into your service for a time.  They don't even technically have to be savage!
Stop a robot, golem, or cyborg in their tracks.  Be perfectly prepared for a different kind of apocalypse.

name.str: Scroll of Speak through the Aether
name.str_pl: Scrolls of Speak through the Aether

description: Summon up a magical device that allows you to communicate through radio waves.  Well, maybe there's someone still out there.
Power all of your devices using mana instead of electricity.
Weld metal using touch alone.  It'll do a number on a zombie too.
When the going gets tough, the tough summon yards-thick walls of solid rock around themselves.
Transform a long stick into a spear that drips with sticky sap.
Conjure a lashing bunch of animated vines that will grab and hold your enemies.
Transform your skin into bark covered in sharp thorns.
Conjure a bunch of thick brambles out of the ground to either form a wall or slow your enemies.
Summon up a large cloud of mist that will conceal your movements from your enemies.

name.str: Scroll of Heart of the Hurricane
name.str_pl: Scrolls of Heart of the Hurricane

description: Compress raging storm winds into a shell around you to protect you.
Someone has scribbled on this scroll incolored pencil?  You're pretty sure whatever it does now isn't the spell's original function.
Grow a pair of barbed tentacles from your shoulders that will attack enemies in melee range.
Snap your fingers and get rid of that nasty cold or flu.
Enemy wizards got you down?  Just remove all their magic and punch them in the face.
Remove all magic from your target, even rare or powerful spells.  Who's the archmage now?
Cuts?  Lacerations?  Torn organs?  Fix all that with this handy spell.
Keep all that blood in your body.
Turn your fingers into myriad bone knives.
Turn your blood into acid, just like that movie you used to watch all that time.

Grow an entire forest from nothing, given enough time and mana.  There were druids who made good money doing this for industrial logging, the ethics of which were always good to start an argument at a party.
Grow a log from a living tree and prune it without violence.
Using a bit of water, transfer water's refreshing chill to yourself.
Grow magical seaweed to form a protective coating, allowing you to travel the depths.

name.str: Scroll of Wash the Wounds Clean
name.str_pl: Scrolls of Wash the Wounds Clean

description: Disinfect your wounds with just a bit of water and magic.
Walk on water using the power of your magic.
Charge a battery using only your mana!  Once of niche use, now a vital skill.
Fire yourself up to give a persuasive speech with this spell.
Turn a fire directly into cold, putting it out.  Once one of the most commonly-known spells in the world, the lack of open flames in daily life has lead to a steep decline in its use.
Summon a sphere of ice to preserve your food inside.  Once a vital spell to keep food from rotting, then a party trick to keep drinks cold at the beach, and now back to vital once again.
Turn dirt into solid rock.  Useful for making a fortress or a castle in a fraction of the time.
Sink into the depths of the earth to heal more quickly and make sleep more restful.  You don't need to eat or drink either  Say, how many earthshapers are still asleep down there?
The single most well-known spell in the entire world before the Cataclysm.  Why take a shower and do your laundry if you can get magic to do it for you?
